CDX Example

A single carbon atom stored as CDX:

Download Carbon.cdx

This is a listing showing the structure and contents of a CDX file which contains only a single carbon atom.

This CDX file has a top-level Document object which contains a bunch of properties ("Creating Program" through "MacPrintInfo") and a single object ("Page") with ID 1.'

The Page object contains a single Fragment object with ID 4.

The Fragment object contains a single Node object with ID 2

The Node object contains several properties ("Node Type" through "Node_LabelDisplay") and a Text object with ID 3.

The Text object contains several properties ("Text" through "Front-to-back order").

------------------
Document ID 0
| *Creating program: ChemDraw 5.0
| *Name: Carbon.cdx
| *Bounding box (ltrb): (141.00,144.00,150.00,155.00)
| *Window position: (206.00,167.00)
| *Window size: (375.00,571.00)
| *Bond spacing: 120
| *Bold width: 4.00
| *Bond length: 30.00
| *Line width: 1.00
| *Margin width: 2.00
| *Hash spacing: 2.70
| *Chain angle: 120.0 degrees
| *Fractional widths: Use
| *FontTable: 2 fonts: Arial[intern#3/encoding=4E4], Times New Roman[intern#4/encoding=4E4]
| *ColorTable: 10 colors: BLACK, WHITE, WHITE, BLACK, RED, YELLOW, GREEN, CYAN, BLUE, MAGENTA
| *MacPrintInfo: [120 bytes]
| Page ID 1
| | Fragment ID 4
| | | Node ID 2
| | | | *Node Type: Element
| | | | *2D Position: (145.00,149.25)
| | | | *Front-to-back order: 0
| | | | *Node_LabelDisplay: 1 [ 1 bytes]
| | | | Text ID 3
| | | | | *Text: "C" Styles[ChStart/Font/Face/Size/Color]=[0/3/96/10.0/3]
| | | | | *Justification: Left
| | | | | *Label alignment: Left
| | | | | *2D Position: (141.90,152.75)
| | | | | *Bounding box (ltrb): (143.00,146.00,148.00,153.00)
| | | | | *Front-to-back order: 1
------------------
